subject: Hockey, Ice
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Concussions
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Brendan Shanahan, the N.H.L.’s chief disciplinarian for on-ice offenses, has aggressively been applying new rules against harsh hits in the preseason.
snippet: Brendan Shanahan, the N.H.L.’s chief disciplinarian for on-ice offenses, has aggressively been applying new rules against harsh hits in the preseason.
